title: 681: BITCOIN ON TRACK TO HIT $350K BY YEAR-END, WITH CHANCE OF $1M BTC IN EXTENDED CYCLE, SAYS MACRO GURU
description:
Macro guru Raoul Pal predicts that Bitcoin (BTC) can skyrocket over 700% from its current price in the coming months and that Ethereum (ETH), the leading smart contract platform can surge over 480%.

“My price prediction has been ETH north of $20,000, and that’s pretty simple. All I did is just map over the ETH chart to the Bitcoin 2017 chart."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
